name: US-JIA, LLC (NORTHEAST MAGLEV)
description: US-JIA, LLC is supporting Northeast Maglev, a high speed magnetic levitation rail project.
sampleDescriptions: Providing support for Northeast Maglev rail project. Early discussions with House and Senate Members of Congress on logistics. Surface Transportation Reauthorization
